content: God, everything is so different in there. You can feel how cut off you are. It's this entirely separate world and you encompass most of it. And the sound. Isn't the sound different on the inside? It's like it's singing. I had this dream in there - I was on or near the ocean, and I just kept hearing the surf. It was so uneventful. At night. And the tide kept coming in and out.
author: Shane Carruth
